glsa.title: xine-lib: Buffer overflow vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: xine-lib contains a buffer overflow vulnerability which may lead to the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: xine-lib is the xine core engine. xine is a free multimedia player. It plays CDs, DVDs, and VCDs, and can also decode other common multimedia formats.

description.p: Federico L. Bossi Bonin discovered that when handling MPEG streams xine-lib fails to make a proper boundary check of the input data supplied by the user before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to play a specially-crafted MPEG file, resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the permissions of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
